name: amm
docs: Program for AMM

instructions.name: initializePermissionedPool
docs: Initialize a new permissioned pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (arbitrary address)

accounts.name: lpMint
docs: LP token mint of the pool

accounts.name: tokenAMint
docs: Token A mint of the pool. Eg: USDT

accounts.name: tokenBMint
docs: Token B mint of the pool. Eg: USDC

accounts.name: aVault
docs: Vault account for token A. Token A of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

accounts.name: bVault
docs: Vault account for token B. Token B of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

accounts.name: aVaultLpMint
docs: LP token mint of vault A

accounts.name: bVaultLpMint
docs: LP token mint of vault B

accounts.name: aVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault A. Used to receive/burn the vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

accounts.name: bVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault B. Used to receive/burn vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

accounts.name: adminTokenA
docs: Admin token account for pool token A mint. Used to bootstrap the pool with initial liquidity.

accounts.name: adminTokenB
docs: Admin token account for pool token B mint. Used to bootstrap the pool with initial liquidity.

accounts.name: adminPoolLp
docs: Admin pool LP token account. Used to receive LP during first deposit (initialize pool)
Admin pool LP token account. Used to receive LP during first deposit (initialize pool)

accounts.name: protocolTokenAFee
docs: Protocol fee token account for token A. Used to receive trading fee.

accounts.name: protocolTokenBFee
docs: Protocol fee token account for token B. Used to receive trading fee.

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin account. This account will be the admin of the pool, and the payer for PDA during initialize pool.

accounts.name: rent
docs: Rent account.

accounts.name: vaultProgram
docs: Vault program. The pool will deposit/withdraw liquidity from the vault.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Token program.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: Associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: System program.

instructions.name: enableOrDisablePool
docs: Enable or disable a pool. A disabled pool allow only remove balanced liquidity operation.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (PDA)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin account. Must be owner of the pool.

instructions.name: swap
docs: Swap token A to B, or vice versa. An amount of trading fee will be charged for liquidity provider, and the admin of the pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (PDA)

accounts.name: userSourceToken
docs: User token account. Token from this account will be transfer into the vault by the pool in exchange for another token of the pool.

accounts.name: userDestinationToken
docs: User token account. The exchanged token will be transfer into this account from the pool.

accounts.name: aVault
docs: Vault account for token a. token a of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

accounts.name: bVault
docs: Vault account for token b. token b of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

accounts.name: aTokenVault
docs: Token vault account of vault A

accounts.name: bTokenVault
docs: Token vault account of vault B

accounts.name: aVaultLpMint
docs: Lp token mint of vault a

accounts.name: bVaultLpMint
docs: Lp token mint of vault b

accounts.name: aVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault A. Used to receive/burn the vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

accounts.name: bVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault B. Used to receive/burn the vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

accounts.name: protocolTokenFee
docs: Protocol fee token account. Used to receive trading fee. It's mint field must matched with user_source_token mint field.

accounts.name: user
docs: User account. Must be owner of user_source_token.

accounts.name: vaultProgram
docs: Vault program. the pool will deposit/withdraw liquidity from the vault.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Token program.

instructions.name: removeLiquiditySingleSide
docs: Withdraw only single token from the pool. Only supported by pool with stable swap curve.

docs: Deposit tokens to the pool in an imbalance ratio. Only supported by pool with stable swap curve.

instructions.name: removeBalanceLiquidity
docs: Withdraw tokens from the pool in a balanced ratio. User will still able to withdraw from pool even the pool is disabled. This allow user to exit their liquidity when there's some unforeseen event happen.

instructions.name: overrideCurveParam
docs: Update swap curve parameters. This function do not allow update of curve type. For example: stable swap curve to constant product curve. Only supported by pool with stable swap curve.
Only amp is allowed to be override. The other attributes of stable swap curve will be ignored.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Token program.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: Associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: System program.

instructions.name: updateActivationPoint
docs: Update activation slot

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (PDA)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin account.

instructions.name: withdrawProtocolFees
docs: Withdraw protocol fee

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (PDA)

instructions.name: setWhitelistedVault
docs: Set whitelisted vault

instructions.name: partnerClaimFee
docs: Partner claim fee

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account (PDA)

fields.name: poolCreatorAuthority
docs: Only pool_creator_authority can use the current config to initialize new pool. When it's Pubkey::default, it's a public config.

fields.name: activationType
docs: Activation type

accounts.name: LockEscrow
docs: State of lock escrow account

fields.name: pool
docs: Pool address

fields.name: owner
docs: Owner address

fields.name: escrowVault
docs: Vault address, store the lock user lock

fields.name: bump
docs: bump, used to sign

fields.name: totalLockedAmount
docs: Total locked amount

fields.name: lpPerToken
docs: Lp per token, virtual price of lp token

fields.name: unclaimedFeePending
docs: Unclaimed fee pending

fields.name: aFee
docs: Total a fee claimed so far

fields.name: bFee
docs: Total b fee claimed so far

accounts.name: Pool
docs: State of pool account

fields.name: lpMint
docs: LP token mint of the pool

fields.name: tokenAMint
docs: Token A mint of the pool. Eg: USDT

fields.name: tokenBMint
docs: Token B mint of the pool. Eg: USDC

fields.name: aVault
docs: Vault account for token A. Token A of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

fields.name: bVault
docs: Vault account for token B. Token B of the pool will be deposit / withdraw from this vault account.

fields.name: aVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault A. Used to receive/burn the vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

fields.name: bVaultLp
docs: LP token account of vault B. Used to receive/burn the vault LP upon deposit/withdraw from the vault.

fields.name: aVaultLpBump
docs: "A" vault lp bump. Used to create signer seeds.

fields.name: enabled
docs: Flag to determine whether the pool is enabled, or disabled.

fields.name: protocolTokenAFee
docs: Protocol fee token account for token A. Used to receive trading fee.

fields.name: protocolTokenBFee
docs: Protocol fee token account for token B. Used to receive trading fee.

fields.name: feeLastUpdatedAt
docs: Fee last updated timestamp

fields.name: fees
docs: Store the fee charges setting.

fields.name: poolType
docs: Pool type

fields.name: stake
docs: Stake pubkey of SPL stake pool

fields.name: totalLockedLp
docs: Total locked lp token

fields.name: bootstrapping
docs: bootstrapping config

fields.name: padding
docs: Padding for future pool field

fields.name: curveType
docs: The type of the swap curve supported by the pool.

types.name: TokenMultiplier
docs: Multiplier for the pool token. Used to normalized token with different decimal into the same precision.

fields.name: tokenAMultiplier
docs: Multiplier for token A of the pool.

fields.name: tokenBMultiplier
docs: Multiplier for token B of the pool.

fields.name: precisionFactor
docs: Record the highest token decimal in the pool. For example, Token A is 6 decimal, token B is 9 decimal. This will save value of 9.

types.name: PoolFees
docs: Information regarding fee charges

fields.name: tradeFeeNumerator
docs: Trade fees are extra token amounts that are held inside the token
accounts during a trade, making the value of liquidity tokens rise.
Trade fee numerator

fields.name: tradeFeeDenominator
docs: Trade fee denominator

fields.name: protocolTradeFeeNumerator
docs: Protocol trading fees are extra token amounts that are held inside the token
accounts during a trade, with the equivalent in pool tokens minted to
the protocol of the program.
Protocol trade fee numerator

fields.name: protocolTradeFeeDenominator
docs: Protocol trade fee denominator

types.name: Depeg
docs: Contains information for depeg pool

fields.name: baseVirtualPrice
docs: The virtual price of staking / interest bearing token

fields.name: baseCacheUpdated
docs: The last time base_virtual_price is updated

fields.name: depegType
docs: Type of the depeg pool

fields.name: tradeFeeNumerator
docs: Trading fee.

fields.name: activationPoint
docs: The pool start trading.

fields.name: hasAlphaVault
docs: Whether the pool support alpha vault

fields.name: activationType
docs: Activation type

fields.name: padding
docs: Padding

types.name: Padding
docs: Padding for future pool fields

fields.name: padding0
docs: Padding 0

fields.name: padding1
docs: Padding 1

fields.name: padding2
docs: Padding 2

fields.name: activationPoint
docs: Activation point, can be slot or timestamp

fields.name: whitelistedVault
docs: Whitelisted vault to be able to buy pool before activation_point

fields.name: poolCreator
docs: Need to store pool creator in lauch pool, so they can modify liquidity before activation_point

fields.name: activationType
docs: Activation type, 0 means by slot, 1 means by timestamp

types.name: ActivationType
docs: Type of the activation

types.name: RoundDirection
docs: Rounding direction

types.name: TradeDirection
docs: Trade (swap) direction

types.name: NewCurveType
docs: Type of the swap curve

fields.name: amp
docs: Amplification coefficient

fields.name: token_multiplier
docs: Multiplier for the pool token. Used to normalized token with different decimal into the same precision.

fields.name: depeg
docs: Depeg pool information. Contains functions to allow token amount to be repeg using stake / interest bearing token virtual price

fields.name: last_amp_updated_timestamp
docs: The last amp updated timestamp. Used to prevent update_curve_info called infinitely many times within a short period

types.name: CurveType
docs: Type of the swap curve

fields.name: amp
docs: Amplification coefficient

fields.name: token_multiplier
docs: Multiplier for the pool token. Used to normalized token with different decimal into the same precision.

fields.name: depeg
docs: Depeg pool information. Contains functions to allow token amount to be repeg using stake / interest bearing token virtual price

fields.name: last_amp_updated_timestamp
docs: The last amp updated timestamp. Used to prevent update_curve_info called infinitely many times within a short period

types.name: DepegType
docs: Type of depeg pool

types.name: Rounding
docs: Round up, down

types.name: PoolType
docs: Pool type

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: FaultyLpMint
errors.msg: LP mint authority must be 'A' vault lp, without freeze authority, and 0 supply

errors.name: IdenticalSourceDestination
errors.msg: Identical user source and destination token account

errors.name: MisMatchedCurve
errors.msg: New curve is mismatched with old curve

errors.name: MismatchedDepegMint
errors.msg: Token mint B doesn't matches depeg type token mint

errors.name: InvalidAuthorityToCreateThePool
errors.msg: Invalid authority to create the pool
